II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2011'07'01 281
wxl 1"713 - 2011 cQ,s ui 01 jeks isl=rdod - 2011'07'01
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 282
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihlu uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok
Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kakd ish¿u oekaùï .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;=h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2011 cQ,s ui 08 jeks Èk
m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2011 cqks ui 24 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg
NdrÈh hq;=h'
,Ëuka .=KjO_k"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s'
2011 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=j"
fld<U 08'
281 - B 0 80237—2,200 (2011/07)
D 1 -
    msgqj
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2011'07'01282
osid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - ñkqjkaf.dv
wjika ù jir 05la bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrkq ,en" wjikaj oekg jir myl ^05&l ld,hla bl=;a jQ my; i|yka kvq jd¾;d fuu .eiÜ ksfõokfha Èk isg
;=ka uila bl=;a jQ miq úkdY lsÍug mshjr .kakd nj fuhska oekqï fokq ,efí'
2' tneúka fuu kvq jd¾;djl fyda bka fldgil msgm;a ,nd .ekSug woyia lrk hï ;eke;af;l= fõ kï" .eiÜ ksfõokfha
Èk isg ;=ka uil ld,hla bl=;a ùug fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; b,a¨ï l, hq;= nj jeäÿrg;a oekqï fokq ,efí'
Èid úksiqre iy ufyia;%d;a'
2011 cqks ui 01 jeks Èk"
ñkqjkaf.dv Èid ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha § h'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2011'07'01 295
39540
39541
39542

39943
39944
39945
07-04
úúO oekaùï
isú,a wêlrK n,h l%shdfõ fhdojñka fld<U § mj;ajkq
,nk niakdysr m<d;a jdKsc uydêlrKfha § h'
2007 wxl 07 ork iud.ï mkf;a 270 iy$fyda
272 j.ka;s hgf;a jk b,a,Su yd iïnkaO
ldrKdjhs'
n;a;ruq,a," chka;smqr" ueo mdf¾ wxl 1 ork
ia:dkfha íÆ ,hska iS *qâ ^m%hsjÜ& ,sñgâ"
ms<sn|j ldrKdjhs'
iy
2007 wxl 07 ork iud.ï mkf;a 270 ^wd&
iy 270 ^B& j.ka;s hgf;a íÆ ,hska iS *qâ
^m%hsjÜ& ,sñgâ iud.u wEjr lsÍu i|yd jk
b,a,Su yd iïnkaO ldrKdjhs'
yis; iqñkao Èidkdhl"
wxl 1" ueo mdr"
chka;smqr" n;a;ruq,a,'
kvq wxl( tÉiS ^isú,a&
26$2011$iud.ï
fm;aiïlre
fld<U § mj;ajkq ,nk ^ish isú,a wêlrK n,h l%shd;aul
flfrk& niakdysr m<d;a uydêlrKh úiska by; kï i|yka
iud.u .Kka fírd jid oeóu msKsi fm;aiula 2011'05'06 jk Èk
tlS wêlrKh fj; fm;aiïlre fjkqfjka kS;s{ b÷ks,a ksYdka;
nKavdr uy;d úiska bÈßm;a lr we;s njo" tlS fm;aiu 2011'07'07
jeks Èk wêlrKh bÈßfhys le|ùug kshu lr we;s nj o" tlS
fm;aiu u; ksfhda.hla lsÍu ;yjqre lsÍug fmr Bg iydh ùug
fyda úreoaO ùug fyda leu;s tlS iud.fï lsishï Kh ysñfhl=
fyda$ iy odhlfhl= fõ kï ta ;eke;a;dg ;;ald¾hh i|yd th
úNd. lrkq ,nk wjia:dfõys fm!oa.,slj fyda ;udf.a kS;s{jrhd
ud¾.fhka fyda fmkS isáh yels nj o" fm;aifï msgm;la" wjYH jk
tlS iud.fï ´kEu Kh ysñfhl=g fyda$iy odhlhl=g ta i|yd
kshñ; .dia;=j f.jQ úg my; i|yka wh úiska imhkq ,nk nj o"
